I'm lost. Can someone help me please? SynthSy
you said activate by phone? Maybe if I search online I can come up with the number but on the activation readme it seems as though activating by phone adobe will suspect something.
When activating through phone, it will give you the phone number along with another number you put in keygen. you will never be connected to adobe's HQ

Ok SynthSy, you rule.  Application installed and all is well with the world.  I sir, owe you an adult beverage.  Or several.

For those of you out there, this is painfully easy which is why I got so pissed at myself for not figuring this out.  Here are my step by step instructions that a kid watching Sesame Street could follow...

Open the keygen generator and begin to install the app.  When it asks for a serial number cut & paste the number at the very top of the keygen remarkably called Serial Number.  When it then asks for activation over the Internet choose Other Options and then choose Over The Phone.

There is NO NEED to call the toll free line.

You'll see your earlier entered Serial Number on this screen with another series of numbers under that.  Copy those second set of numbers in to the middle portion of SynthSy's keygen and hit Generate Activation.  On the keygen, a third series of numbers then shows which you put in the Activation area back on the Photoshop install screen.  From there hit Submit and all should be well.

Again, don't call the 800 number!  Dooohhhhh!

Easy as pie.  Now, let's all thank SynthSy for his time and trouble uploading this for our edification.
there is supposed to be 12 seeders, only 2 - 3 are around, So please seed cause i am not able to as much
